org.ff4j.audit.repository

Interface EventRepository

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractEventRepository, InMemoryEventRepository, JdbcEventRepository, KeyValueEventRepository

    public interface EventRepository
    Persistence store for Event messages.
    Author:
    Cedrick Lunven (@clunven)

    • Method Detail

      • saveEvent

        boolean saveEvent(Event e)
        Save event into store synchronously.
        Parameters:
        e - target event to store
        Returns:
        if saving is OK

      • getEventByUUID

        Event getEventByUUID(String uuid,
                     Long timestamp)
        Retrieve an event by its unique identifer.
        Parameters:
        uuid - get detail from a single event by its ID
        timestamp - help to find the UUID (optional).
        Returns:
        target event detail

      • getFeatureUsageHitCount

        Map<String,MutableHitCount> getFeatureUsageHitCount(EventQueryDefinition query)
        Count hit ratio of features between 2 dates. This will be used for different charts.
        Parameters:
        startTime - start date
        endTime - end time
        Returns:

      • getFeatureUsagePieChart

        PieChart getFeatureUsagePieChart(EventQueryDefinition query)
        Draw a pie chart where each sector is for a feature. The value of each sector is the number of execution of the feature during the period of time. Pie : Sector/Feature, value- number of check OK
        Parameters:
        startTime - start time of window
        endTime - end time of window
        Returns:

      • getFeatureUsageBarChart

        BarChart getFeatureUsageBarChart(EventQueryDefinition query)
        Get hit curves.
        Parameters:
        filteredFeatureNames - target feature name set
        nbslot - number of measure
        startTime - starttime for measure
        endTime - endtime for measure
        Returns:
        map of curves

      • getFeatureUsageHistory

        TimeSeriesChart getFeatureUsageHistory(EventQueryDefinition query,
                                       TimeUnit tu)
        Create measure over time.
        Parameters:
        startTime - time to begin measures
        endTime - time to end measures
        nbPoints - number of points.
        filteredFeatures - if you want to filtered feature usage
        Returns:

      • getFeatureUsageTotalHitCount

        int getFeatureUsageTotalHitCount(EventQueryDefinition query)
        Get all events.
        Returns:
        all event in the repository

      • searchFeatureUsageEvents

        EventSeries searchFeatureUsageEvents(EventQueryDefinition query)
        Search over events.
        Returns:
        a list of events

        Parameters:
        starTime - begin date
        endTime - end time
